title: Population of Greece 2016 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The lowest value at Gender Males is 2.06x times less than the highest value at Total.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The lowest value at Gender Males is 2.06x times less than the highest value at Total.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Gender in the x axis and Total population in the y axis.
The maximum Total population 10783748.0 is found at Gender Total and the minimum is found at Males where Gender is 5224210.0.
The second highest Total population is appeared to be the Gender Females.
The highest Gender Total has 5559538.0 more Total population than the lowest Gender Males.
The average Total population in all 3 Genders is 7189165.33.
Summing up the values of all Genders, we get total 21567496.0.
